name: Cosmosis (Jasonblox6)
description:
Cosmosis is a small puzzle arcade game that I worked on for about a month. 

In Cosmosis, you help a Space Princess named Lila attempt to recollect her wealth by combining similar coloured gems together to form combos. You do this by dropping one gem at a time into a selected column.

The more gems you combo, the more points you will earn.

The player has 120 seconds in which to reclaim as many gems as they can. What will your highest score be?


CONTROLS:

X - Start, Replay

Space - Drop Gem
